alert.note: Alert for Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 01 at 8:45AM EDT until May 01 at 11:11AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring along Little Ascutney Road. * WHERE...A portion of southern Vermont, including the following county, Windsor. * WHEN...Until 1145 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 843 AM EDT, emergency management reported flooding in the warned area. Flooding is already occurring and Little Ascutney Road has been closed between VT Route 106 and Lottery Lane. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Weathersfield and Amsden. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Obey all road closure signage and local officials.
